Class EnsembleMLCEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractEvaluator
      • net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractParallelEvaluator
        • eme.EnsembleMLCEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IEvaluator, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC

    public class EnsembleMLCEvaluator
extends net.sf.jclec.base.AbstractParallelEvaluator
    Author:
    Jose M. Moyano: jmoyano@uco.es Class implementing the evaluator for individuals in EME
    See Also:
